You did a fantastic job with this! It would be great if there was a free character available every day.

The Spike is what happens when anime passion meets volleyball physics and emotional damage. You start off thinking, “It’s just volleyball,” and ten minutes later you’re sweating, screaming, and timing your spike like your life depends on it.

Played this game on my phone for hours and it has great story and gameplay, it would be even better if there were log in events as well as events you can play. Starting off the game theres a lot of content to go through and learn, so I recommend to anyone that enjoys volleyball and a good challenge.
Quality gameplay with a nice story. The events are also good.
Best game I've ever played, about 150 hours of gameplay on mobile but I still love it just as much
Love it. Simple yet challenging and competitive. Awesome work from the devs.
cant login at all. I just downloaded the game and I cant login it keeps failing.
This  game is kind a cool and intersting  . But catching the timing a little hard . Despite that playing this game is fun.
fucking awesome, feels satisfying to play and like first good volleyball game

Really nice game, Ive ben palying it a lot since the last year and i really enjoy it
tough i must say that i perfer the mobile version
i loved the og ''The Spike'' ive had nishikawa and the most op dudes ever. Too bad the server shut down but i love that the devs are trying to make the game better and all

Fun gameplay, pretty challenging but easy when you know what youre doing

Fun game but needs online multiplayer badly, once it's released it'll take off in popularity.

The game feels awesome, I already play this game on mobile, but i wanted to try the multiplayer... even tho the game is good, the compatibility is ass, like i have a 5070 and i am locked at 60 fps with stutter, and the multiplayer is only local and i mean yeah there is the steam remote control but is not the best if u have a bad connection like i expected it to be online (nothing like online matchmaking but something like a private custom game where u can invite friends) and also the log in like u released a game on steam and then u tell us to log in with either google or apple, and if u log in with ur google play (not google) email in the google account it creates a new account without asking you (is a problem since the early days of sucyan) so you try to link it on your main but u gotta delete the new account cause the mail it's already in use (it takes 30 fkn days... i created a new email)... what im trying to say is to ASK us if we want to create a new account and add a steam account log in that when you click on it it ASK you if you want to LINK or CREATE A NEW ACCOUNT.
We could have waited for the release, you could've postponed it for better release, but you announced it like an hour before the official release date (ig idk)
so the game feels very good already but to fix are still : Optimization, Multiplayer and Account log in
This game's fire. The gameplay is simple yet can be challenging keep you coming back for more. You can tell the dev put a lot of passion into this.

The Spike is what happens when anime passion meets volleyball physics and emotional damage. You start off thinking, “It’s just volleyball,” and ten minutes later you’re sweating, screaming, and timing your spike like your life depends on it. Every match feels like the finals of the Olympics, except everyone jumps 10 feet in the air and looks way cooler doing it. The story somehow made me care about volleyball and my character’s emotional growth. I came to spike balls, but I stayed to cry with the boys. 10/10, volleyball has never been this dramatic—or this fun.
Fun game but needs online multiplayer badly, once it's released it'll take off in popularity.

I love this game i got every s+ up until now and its great

I logged in with google but why cant i log in with my play games i played it on phone before and unfortunately spend some money i want to play it on my Pc to so please ad the button to connect it to my play games and fore some reason it crashes and it doesn't work anymore even when I did the end task from task manager please fix it its a good game
Love the game so much, i am a veteran id suggest playing it on Pc and Mobile too
You did a fantastic job with this! It would be great if there was a free character available every day.
Its great. The game play is nice, The speed of the game is perfect. Fast enough for it to be challenging but slow enough to be possible to be played.

I have a lot of hours on the predecessor to this game "The Spike" on steam, and while this game is definitely an improvement compared to the old game, I'm not really a fan of the fact that the game has moved to an almost live-service model with so many micro-transactions, a Google login and I'm assuming some sort of cheat detection system.
Should consider making a version of the game that is pay to play but you don't have all these micro-transactions. Something like having the Google Play Pass subscription, where you can make all the in-app purchases for free. I like messing around with different characters and I don't like the idea of having to do a lot of grind to get those characters.

PS: People who have The Spike in their library should get some sort of rewards in the game, imo.
Would recommend very good game Pretty confusing at first but you'll get use to it.

Have been playing this since the original The Spike was on steam. This game has come a long way and I have really enjoyed these past years, just getting on and playing the tournaments every day and the events every now and then. Team SUNCYAN has done an amazing job and the best is yet to come!

I've been playing this game on mobile for over a year now, and the PC version is very satisfying. 
The gameplay is good, the story is great and the other modes are very fun to play.
Only problem i see is for the events, maybe make it so Gold players can play them !
Overall it's a great volleyball game, test it out !

perhaps the best volleyball game around at the moment, as someone who has been playing for a long time (long before the steam re-release), and for all the people thinking the game is not good because of its' gacha, the game IS f2p friendly, so yeah, if you're looking for a good vb game? THIS is your go-to
So far so good, has a learning curve to it, but the more you practice and get better at it, the more fun the game is

negative.review: the ball will phase through the net from time to time the npcs are horrible and will straight up sabotage the gameplay i HATE atis bro HATE HIM s tier BUM games pretty addicting tho im just salty because i've been on a losing streak to this raul dude:I

this dropped after my birthday, yay,

the gameplay is ass, you have to do the same thing over and over again and hit the same macro everytime for a sprite game.

it has better story? typical, but absolutely terrible gameplay, 3.5/5 for story, 1/10 for gameplay

edit : I got better at the game, felt like fun until the dialouges, I defeat people without letting them score at all and the game says "wow siwoo you won by a thread, not so electrifying" "so close" while they scored less than 2 points, the dialouge is shit, the story is shit, don't play this game

as well as inaccuracy, sometimes you can do a foul and get away with it, sometimes not, its a 3v3 all gender, a fantasy world, yeah its a game but atleast try to be realistic on balls, the ball, even if it touches the ground the game goes on without giving a score, literal what.

but I still kept playing this game cuz this is low space and to pass time, its not doing so well, every dialouge is ass, but its okay.

Absolute Garbage pay to win game unless you spend money you CANNOT ENJOY the game OR PROGRESS the story beacuse you need good players and good luck getting that with the games reward system or upgrading them you may reach as far as stage 6 but thats where you will end cuz you cannot beat azure garbage S PLUS with one or two s rank players Garbage game do not recommend P2W
Fucking nigger gamei can't even login via google
cant sex the volleyball 0/10
cant log in
Its just too hard

I’ve had a great time with this game since it was in mobile for a long time — the gameplay loop is addictive, the art direction is beautiful, and updates keep things fresh.

My only real issue is with the account binding system. Once your account is linked, there’s no way to unbind or switch platforms. That can be risky if you lose access to your linked service or want to change how your data is stored.

It would be great to see the devs add a secure unbind feature (with verification and cooldowns) in future updates. That extra flexibility would make the game even more player-friendly.

Overall, still recommend — great game, just hoping for a bit more control over account settings in the future.

(I will update my review if this is available)
